name: Hilt: Against The Hoardes
description:
A dungeon crawler game for Amiga & Amiga emulators. I originally released this game in 1994.

Hilt is a simple roguelike dungeon game. Take a cast of characters down into a dungeon of possibly infinite depth. Find scrolls, potions, books of spells and treasure. Seek ever stronger monsters, gold and magical objects.

Supplied in ADF format for use with Amiga emulators.
